attributes.action:
Petition for urgent medical help for
Depression suffers
attributes.background:
Depression suffer needs urgent 
Medical help. People are suffering in
Silence and taking their own lives 
Cause not giving the help and support they need. There is not enough medical train staff. One person was told that he has to wait 
About one year to get help.
We need urgent medical help

rejection.details:
We're not sure what help you would like the Government to give to people with depression. You could start a new petition asking for the specific change you want to see.

For example, you could ask the Government to increase funding, so that help can be given more quickly to people with depression.
